session.speaker: Brian Hamilton
session.bio: Brian is an experienced technologist and start up veteran. Working on everything from telephony to cybersecurity to Federal Contracting, Brian has built QA Teams from ground zero, grown existing teams, and is a champion of Quality Best Practices and a Shift Left devotee.
session.title: Driving Impactful 1:1 Meetings: Empowering QA/QE Professionals and their Managers for growth.
session.abstract: One-on-one meetings are a cornerstone of effective team management, yet their true potential is often untapped, especially within Software Quality Assurance/Quality Engineering (QA/QE) teams. This session explores how QA/QE professionals can proactively shape their 1:1 meetings to foster growth, clarity, and collaboration, while also equipping managers/supervisors with actionable strategies to lead these conversations for maximum impact.
